EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Events from The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To Challenge Society Grads,
Here are two upcoming events, organised by your fellow grads:
Event 1
Do you want another excellent opportunity to reunite with those you completed the challenge with? Do you like listening to inspiring live music, watching exotic cultural dances and acts and eating FREE food? Of course you do and as it just so happens the NERF challenge youth board 2014 have just the event for you!
On the 15th of March, UNITE will be coming to the Forest Gate Youth Zone (Postcode E7 0DH) from 2pm -5:30pm. Mashing together a great variety of culturally diverse performances and a motivational speaker, UNITE aims to increase social cohesion in Waltham Forest, Redbridge, Newham and Enfield. This event is totally unique so it is something you do not want to miss!
Please RSVP by responding to this email or joining our Facebook event. Also, feel free to invite friends who did not complete the challenge. See you there! Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/events/705976389422631/?ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming
Event 2
Kaizen presents GET ACTIVE
Come along to Kaizen's GET ACTIVE day, to try out new sports and activities in your local area!
Workshops include:
Roller Blading Football Zumba Sumo Wrestling Suits Art Skills And others!
Date Saturday 22nd March Time 1.00pm-4.00pm Venue Forest Gate Youth Zone E7 0DH
To book your place, please email GETACTIVE to reachingcommunities@hotmail.com
See you there!
